titleStmt.title: Hæc-vir: or, The womanish-man: being an answere to a late booke intituled Hic-mulier. Exprest in a briefe dialogue betweene Hæc-vir the womanish-man, and Hic-mulier the man-woman.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for I. T[rundle] and are to be sold at Christ Church gate,

notesStmt.note: A reply to STC 13374 et seq.
With a title-page woodcut; head-piece, initial.
Identification of printer and publisher from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
